DOC.brief_summary: This is a 12-week double-blind placebo controlled parallel group study of the efficacy of varenicline (Chantix) for smoking cessation in schizophrenic patients, and its effect on cognitive function in patients with schizophrenia. Correlations will be made with biological predictors of efficacy: a) measures of nicotinic receptors in lymphocytes b) DNMT1 and GAD67 mRNA in lymphocytes. Subjects will be current cigarette smokers or hsitory of regular smokers.
DOC.brief_title: Varenicline for Cognitive Deficits and Cigarette Smoking in Schizophrenia - Efficacy and Predictors
